name: Skillet Lasagna Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Why wait on frozen lasagna when you can whip up a quick and tasty one right in your skillet? With easy prep and minimal cleanup, Skillet Lasagna brings all the comforting flavors of the classic Italian dish into one pan. Customize it to suit your taste—try it with the noodles of your choice (we love mafalda pasta for that perfect texture). Enjoy rich layers of sauce, cheese, and pasta in record time—chef’s kiss.
